summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of all requested requirements. A submission dialog component was created with proper form fields, backend storage was implemented with Motoko actor methods, and the GreenCreditWallet was updated to display submissions and balance changes. The implementation maintains the existing design aesthetic and color palette.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for state migration with Map-based storage initialization
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention any migration system, state migration, or migration module requirements. This appears to be an architectural addition beyond the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Rewards system with specific reward tiers (10% off at 500 credits, Free Pickup at 1000, Champion Badge at 2500)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Complex credit calculation formulas beyond basic quantity-based rates' and 'External payment or marketplace integration' as non-goals. The rewards system with specific redemption thresholds appears to go beyond simple credit display.

hallucinated_features.description: Reward redemption functionality with toast notifications for redeeming rewards
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request any reward redemption system. Requirements only specify displaying credits earned, not redeeming them for rewards.

hallucinated_features.description: Progress bar toward next reward with percentage calculation
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions tracking progress toward rewards or displaying progress bars for reward milestones.
The BuildRequest does not request a full transaction history view feature. While recent activity is mentioned in REQ-7 AC, a separate 'View History' button goes beyond this.
